name: Welcome To... Chichester 2 : The Spy Of Chichester And The Eager Tourist Guide
description: Having trouble adjusting to your new location, your rival takes drastic action to bring you back to your sense, whilst an over-eager tourist guide wants nothing more than to show you the local sights
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 upwards Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or better Memory: 8 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX / OpenGL capable GPU Storage: 256 MB available space Sound Card: Any Windows compatible ones
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or better Memory: 16 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX / OpenGL capable GPU Storage: 256 MB available space Sound Card: Any Windows compatible ones
